General.Name: Shanghai Holystar Information Technology Co. Ltd. A
General.Description: Shanghai Holystar Information Technology Co., Ltd. distributes network intelligent equipment. It offers intelligent pole-mounted switches, fault indicators, and auxiliary devices. The company also provides information services, internet of things communication modules, and system integration services, and other products and services. Shanghai Holystar Information Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 2011 and is headquartered in Shanghai, China.
